name: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra
description: Meet the new Galaxy S25 Ultra, the smartphone with titanium colors, a built-in S pen, best camera, custom-made processor, long-lasting battery and much more....

name: boAt Rockerz 650 Pro
description: The boAt Rockerz 650 Pro is a wireless over-ear headphone offering features like long battery life, Dolby Audio, and touch/swipe controls.

name: HP EliteBook Ultra
description: The HP EliteBook Ultra is a business laptop designed for next-generation AI capabilities. It features a 14-inch OLED IPS touch display with Intel Arc Graphics, an Intel Core Ultra 7 processor, and up to 32GB of LPDDR5x RAM.

name: boAt Stone Spinx Pro
description: Portable Speaker with 20W RMS Sound, 8 Hours Playback, Bluetooth v5.0, Dynamic RGB Lights, IPX4 Rating.

name: Galaxy Watch Active2
description: Find your fitness partner in Galaxy Watch Active2, a Samsung smartwatch that tracks your sleep and heart rate, pairs to your phone and fits your look.

name: boAt Nirvana X TWS
description: Wireless Earbuds with Knowles dual drivers, Hi-Res Audio LDAC, 40 Hours Playback, boAt Hi-Fi Sound, ENx™ Technology, Dual Pairing.
